name: X-wing or TIE interceptor?
instruction: I like the X-wing, but I also like the TIE interceptor. Why don't you change the code and choose a starship? Use the ideas below for inspiration.

suggestions.title: Choose a different ship.
suggestions.content: Pick a different ship from the list. Try <kc-string-preview>Poeâ€™s X-wing (side)</kc-string-preview> or <kc-string-preview>TIE Interceptor (side)</kc-string-preview>. Side views work best with the blasters.

suggestions.title: Choose a different blaster sound effect.
suggestions.content: You can change what the blaster sounds like here.

suggestions.title: Change the blast colors.
suggestions.content: Open the color palette and pick a different color for your blasts.

suggestions.title: Change the speed of the blasters.
suggestions.content: A smaller number will make the blasts move across the canvas slowly, and a bigger number will make them go faster.
